item.description:
Hi All,

Come and join our Taiwanese dinner on Friday @ 6:30 p.m.

Please feel free to bring your friends. For those people who haven't participated in any of the events, we welcome you to attend the next meeting join us in meeting new people and sharing interesting topics.

We are going to Jo Jo Taipei on 10/24/2008. Jo Jo is a new Taiwanese restaurant opened in Allston (near Super 88). We heard that this restaurant is quite tasty. So, let's give it a try. We will enjoy Taiwanese food and learning some Chinese words with Boston Area International Dining Out Meetup Group.

Looking forward to seeing you next time!

David Liang 617-697-7257

Direction:

http://www.jojotaipei...

http://www.thrillist....
item.how_to_find_us: Call me if you are late 617-697-7257 or see the meet up sign

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Jo Jo Taipei
